name: REAL ANT
description:
A very realistic ant runs around on your screen. A great way to trick your friends and family. It looks like there is an ant stuck in your screen.

Press cursor up and down to change the ants size. Click or tap the screen and the ant will turn towards the mouse pointer or screen tap.

Tap or click the ant to spawn more ants.

So realistic people will think there's an ant inside your screen.
